input: As a customer, I want to print my invoice so that I have a physical copy
expected: {"id": "US_037", "user_story": "As a customer, I want to print my invoice so that I have a physical copy", "quality_score": 0.74, "test_cases": [{"id": "TC_075", "title": "Print order invoice", "priority": "medium", "preconditions": "User is viewing order details", "steps": ["Click 'Print Invoice'", "Select printer", "Click print"], "expected_result": "Invoice is printed with all order details"}, {"id": "TC_076", "title": "Print invoice without browser print dialog", "priority": "low", "preconditions": "User is on invoice page", "steps": ["Use keyboard shortcut Ctrl+P"], "expected_result": "Browser print dialog opens"}]}

input: As a user, I want to schedule purchases so that I can receive items on specific dates
expected: {"id": "US_047", "user_story": "As a user, I want to schedule purchases so that I can receive items on specific dates", "quality_score": 0.73, "test_cases": [{"id": "TC_095", "title": "Schedule order delivery", "priority": "high", "preconditions": "User is on checkout page", "steps": ["Click 'Schedule Delivery'", "Select delivery date", "Click confirm"], "expected_result": "Order is scheduled for selected date"}, {"id": "TC_096", "title": "Reschedule order", "priority": "medium", "preconditions": "User has scheduled order", "steps": ["Navigate to order", "Click 'Reschedule'", "Select new date"], "expected_result": "Delivery date is updated"}]}

input: As a customer, I want to search for products by name or category so that I can find what I'm looking for quickly
expected: {"id": "US_004", "user_story": "As a customer, I want to search for products by name or category so that I can find what I'm looking for quickly", "quality_score": 0.89, "test_cases": [{"id": "TC_009", "title": "Search with single keyword", "priority": "high", "preconditions": "User is on the search page AND products with keyword exist", "steps": ["Enter 'laptop' in search field", "Click search button"], "expected_result": "Search results display all products matching 'laptop' AND result count is shown"}, {"id": "TC_010", "title": "Search returns no results", "priority": "medium", "preconditions": "User is on the search page", "steps": ["Enter search term that has no matches", "Click search button"], "expected_result": "Message 'No products found' is displayed AND suggestions are provided"}]}

input: As a customer, I want to pay in installments so that I can afford larger purchases
expected: {"id": "US_035", "user_story": "As a customer, I want to pay in installments so that I can afford larger purchases", "quality_score": 0.79, "test_cases": [{"id": "TC_071", "title": "Select installment payment option", "priority": "high", "preconditions": "User is on checkout page", "steps": ["Select installment payment", "Choose payment schedule", "Proceed"], "expected_result": "Installment plan is applied AND payment schedule shown"}, {"id": "TC_072", "title": "View installment payment schedule", "priority": "medium", "preconditions": "User has active installment plan", "steps": ["Navigate to orders", "View payment schedule"], "expected_result": "All scheduled payments are displayed with due dates"}]}
